articles.title: Understanding Clean Architecture
articles.content: Clean Architecture is a software design philosophy that emphasizes separation of concerns, making it easier to manage complexity and evolve the system over time.
articles.author: Alice Johnson

articles.title: Exploring Angular: A Comprehensive Guide
articles.content: Angular is a powerful framework for building dynamic web applications. This guide will help you navigate its features and best practices.
articles.author: Bob Smith

articles.title: Introduction to TypeScript
articles.content: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing. Learn how it improves your development experience.
articles.author: Charlie Brown

articles.title: Best Practices for API Development
articles.content: API development requires careful consideration of design and implementation. Here are some best practices to follow.
articles.author: David Wilson

articles.title: The Future of Web Development
articles.content: Web development is constantly evolving. This article explores upcoming trends and technologies that will shape the future.
articles.author: Eva Green
